Functions
CreateRenderGraphFactory
CAUSTICAPI CRefObj<IRenderGraphFactory> CreateRenderGraphFactory()

Creates a new RenderGraph factory. This factory is used to create nodes that will be added to the render graph

Returns

New render factory object
